title: In-memory engine: pending region may never load
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

Currently, IME only loads a region when a write operation occurs. For read hotspot regions that rarely or never experience writes, IME fails to cache these hotspots promptly, impacting performance.

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

2024/09/19
